price: 32. Y no se acerquen (siquiera) a la fornicación, pues es una inmoralidad y un mal camino a seguir.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
